All told, about one in every 33 children are treated at the NICU … while they can never have enough sickbeds, staff or resources, the neonatologists who work at NICU find themselves fighting around the clock for their little patients.

The year 1933.

Tim is a man who discarded his past but could never forget his brother. Dallas is just a thug, but he always wanted to protect his sister. A mysterious person named "Vino" is the absolute worst killer, yet he's always loved his fiancee. Will the sun peek out from behind the clouds once the bloody rain stops?
2018-04-16|2018-04-22.name: 1933 <Last> The Slash -Bloody to Fair-

2018-04-16|2018-04-22.description:
FAMILY REUNION

Rudeus has conquered the Demon Continent and traveled across half the world. Along the way, he’s made friends and bested enemies. Now, finally, their long adventure is nearing an end. When Rudeus finds his father Paul, it has all the makings of a tender moment–so why does it turn into a father-son brawl? Is Rudy doomed to repeat al the mistakes of his past life?
2018-04-16|2018-04-22.name: Family Reunion

2018-04-16|2018-04-22.description:
Award-winning writer and artist Howaard Chaykin joins forces with Michael Moorcock to bring the Eternal Champion known alternatively as Erekose, Urlik of Skarsol or John Daker to vivid life in this classic tale from 1979.

Includes an exclusive introduction by acclaimed comic book writer Cullen Bunn.
2018-04-16|2018-04-22.name: Erekose: The Swords of Heaven, The Flowers of Hell

2018-04-16|2018-04-22.description: Chika Ono spent most of her life in the city, but due to her mother being sent overseas for work, she goes to live in the countryside with her father for a year. After finally returning to the place she sent the first few years of her life, she soon realizes she can see the spirits and mystical creatures of the forest. The memories of when she lived in the forest are still hazy, but the creatures of the forest still remember her. Will Chika be able to uncover the secrets of the forest and her forgotten memories?

In a world where angels watch over the humans below and punish the fallens: entities of pure evil. Teigi lived an average life; hating the fallens, throwing fits over his flirting friends, and helping Konan with his drug addiction. But, one fateful day, all of that changed. What will Teigi do now that he's been turned into a fallens?! Will it be fight or flight, and will these #friends ever meet again? Find out now in this action-packed manga!

Morgan Bastille is a mortician. Not an ordinary mortician though, a mortician gifted by death. Morgan is looking for a missing person; in order to find that person, he goes to the Detroit Police Station to get help from the captain of the Detroit Exorcism Division, Millenia Browning. Within minutes of his arrival, however, Morgan is taken hostage by a couple of demons! Who exactly is Morgan looking for and will he escape the clutches of the demons?

2018-04-23|2018-04-29.description:
THE FIGHTIN’ FELINE HAS RETURNED TO THE ACTIONVERSE! After appearances in STRAY, Gavin Shaw, aka Midnight Tiger, is back in the saddle in a new four-part story arc entitled “STRONGER.” Gavin’s entire status quo changes as new villains arrive in Apollo Bay and the legacy of Lionsblood flips his world upside down! Art and cover by new regular artist, Éric Van Elslande!

2018-04-23|2018-04-29.description: Juri’s “decision” to destroy the main stone, thereby sacrificing herself, ultimately alters the very modality of the battle within Stasis. After switching his allegiance to the Yukawas, in an attempt to get rid of any bad blood, Shiomi tells them everything he knows about Sagawa … including his “true objective.” While Juri still clings to hopes of avoiding a confrontation with Sagawa, Shiomi quickly dashes them by informing her of the harsh reality of the situation. Meanwhile, with his newfound power to control Handlers, Makoto, together with Takafumi and Tobino, takes to tracking down Sagawa, but then … ?!
2018-04-23|2018-04-29.name: Vol. 7

2018-04-23|2018-04-29.description:
THE BATTLE FOR BRUNE

The hosts of Muozinel march on Brune in their thousands, and all that stands in their way is Tigre and his loyal few. Drastically outnumbered, with no War Maidens at his back, Tigre will need every ounce of cunning and valor he can muster if he’s to prevail. The survival of Brune is at stake, and Muozinel will show no mercy–not to Tigre, or to the hostages in their thrall!
2018-04-23|2018-04-29.name: The Battle For Brune

volume.name: Natsu Katsu - Shokugyou Koukou Yakyuu Kantoku

2018-04-23|2018-04-29.description: Randy and Amalia have struck the first blow against the supernatural cartel, Los Queridos. As the couple arms themselves for war, they must also deal with becoming parents of a child with a very unique condition: he has a flesh-eating monster living in his chest.
2018-04-23|2018-04-29.name: Comida y Balas

2018-04-23|2018-04-29.description:
With solid proof that the lizard people walk among humans—and babies—Tommy struggles with who to trust.

Meiyo - Honor

The Battle for The Outer Sectors has begun.

Sid and The Tech-4 join forces with Sectors 2 and 3 to stop the genocidal march of The Empire and bring a new future to The City.

Ryoku Arashi takes advantage of the absent imperial forces fighting at the battlefront to unleash a one-man assault on Citadel, cutting through the enormous structure and its winding halls full of Elite Troops on an unrelenting fight to the throne and its Supreme Oppressor, Richter Dassen.
2018-04-23|2018-04-29.name: Meiyo - Honor

2018-04-30|2018-05-06.description: JoJo and friends continue to close in on their nemesis, DIO! Their travels take them across the Middle East, where they face new and more powerful enemies—a mysterious woman with magnetic powers, a strange man with the ability to control time and a smooth gambler who deals in souls. Will they die before they even get to DIO?!
2018-04-30|2018-05-06.name: Vol. 7

2018-04-30|2018-05-06.description: Zeon ace Daryl Lorenz works to help Kara Mitchum, the brilliant designer of the Reuse P. Device, recover from the trauma she suffered in the Battle of the Thunderbolt Sector. Meanwhile, after a deadly pursuit and confrontation both in the frozen wastes of Antarctica and the black depths of the ocean, the Federation ship Spartan reaches the territory of the Nanyang Alliance. As the Spartan encounters the first Alliance border patrol units, Io Fleming learns that not all of the Thunderbolt Sector's ghosts are dead...
2018-04-30|2018-05-06.name: Vol. 7

2018-04-30|2018-05-06.description:
The survivors of the rescue mission reach Space Station Benson where Jake Dixon finally confronts Dr Andersen and reveals the truth about the organism attacking them. But as further horror unfolds is it too little too late?

Note: The digital edition (4/25/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.

volume.name: John Carpenter's Tales of Science Fiction: Vortex

2018-04-30|2018-05-06.description: Ghosts in the graveyard -- run, run, run!
2018-04-30|2018-05-06.name: Chapter Seven

2018-04-30|2018-05-06.description: Bruce Wayne confronts Deadshot in his alter ego and the sordid history of the Lawton family is revealed.
2018-04-30|2018-05-06.name: Chapter 7

2018-04-30|2018-05-06.description: The world is a place known as 'Omega', a place where gods live among men. In a country called 'Unshak', there is a group of people who can use the powers of the stars for divination and fortune-telling. When Tan-Shi was a child, he wished he could have a crystal ball just like his father, but when Tan-shi was eight, his parents left him - leaving nothing behind but the crystal ball. Tan-shi and his sister Miyabi were taken in by their uncle. Several years later, Miyabi finds an egg of a very rare bird, but instead of leaving it as it is, she takes it home with her to care for it. Since that day, ten years have passed. Tan-shi is now much older, but the adventure on planet Omega has only just begun!

2018-05-07|2018-05-13.description: Month after month, Professor Eve receives a bouquet of prismatic colored roses with a card that reads "To my beloved Maria" from an expert in romance novels, Seishiro Narumi. Leon, who doesn't know that Seishiro is Eve's real father starts to doubt the two's relationship and goes to his house to confront him. Meanwhile, Eve finds out the chief wants to leave the love research center in the hands of Nadeshiko. But who is more suitable for the job?! The ultimate love guidance. The heartwarming finale!!
2018-05-07|2018-05-13.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-07|2018-05-13.description: Seeking answers to the questions that still haunt her, Yukiko Gosho goes alone to confront a mysterious blood-obsessed cult—the leader of which is none other than Sakurane, the man responsible for the scars on Yukiko’s body and mind. But Sakurane has his own agenda, and he will go to horrifying lengths to pursue it …
2018-05-07|2018-05-13.name: Taken

2018-05-07|2018-05-13.description: Kansai Fifth Technical High School is famous all over Osaka for its thugs.for its thugs. Here the weaklings get beaten into virtual slavery. In order to change his weak self, Matsushita joins the karate club...?!
2018-05-07|2018-05-13.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-07|2018-05-13.description: Mika Akiyama, a girl from the same class as Sotaro Tsubaki, appears with a request to join the club. Her motivation is simply that she wants to be surrounded by good-looking men, but cheerful positive Mika soon becomes a source of jealousy for Aoi. What's more, Aoi has complicated feelings over Suzaku's enthusiasm for Mika joining the club. To make matters worse, Mika and Suzaku are sent on an investigation into an affair - and must disguise themselves as a couple! The story of Aoi and her rival-in-love appear in Chapter 23 "A New Member", and "Confession". Enjoy all 4 stories included in this volume - you won't be able to take your eyes off these cool guys!
2018-05-07|2018-05-13.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-07|2018-05-13.description:
The organization he works for doesn’t trust him. The thing in his brain wants to transform him. Sanity is leaving him. Michael Cray is losing everything. The only hope Michael has to reclaim his mind and his life may come from his next target: a brilliant scientist in London who’s equal parts Nikola Tesla, Hannibal Lecter and Aleister Crowley…Dr. John Constantine! A man obsessed with death, the occult and the darkest powers of the universe, Constantine could hold the power to free Michael of the consciousness inside him—but the price is steep! Michael Cray doesn’t believe in magic, but he’s about to discover how much magic believes in him.

2018-05-07|2018-05-13.description: Magnus is on the outs with his only two supporters, Sasha and Adila, after his reckless actions last issue. Charles, the FBI Branch Seven agent who's taken Magnus under protective custody, offers a distraction in the form of learning more about Magnus's powers. What follows is more mind bending horror; as Magnus opens his mind, he learns more about the real demons lurking in the shadows.

Marcus' widow Jen is now making ends meet by working for Jamie Bennett... and informing on him to the FBI. But when Jen sees a part of Bennett's business she was never meant to see, she has to protect herself and her daughter by picking a side: the career criminal she's blackmailing, or the FBI agents who are blackmailing her.

"If all the world’s a stage, then are all the men and women really merely players? For Sakuya, it all started out as an innocent game: “Why don’t you pretend to be a girl and approach my brother?” Yuuki said. “That’s a great idea!” responded Sakuya who unbeknownst to him would begin to discover he and Yuuki’s brother shared not only many things in common but mutual feelings for each other. Known as Sakura to Yuuki's brother, Sakuya finds himself caught between a rock and a hard place as his feelings for Yuuki's brother continue to increase. Will Sakuya have the courage to confess his real identity and feelings to Yuuki’s brother and will Yuuki’s brother be able to accept Sakuya for who he really is? Find out in "You Haven’t Seen the Best of Me," a light-hearted rom-com sure to make you smile.

volume.name: You Haven't Seen The Best of Me!

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description: With Hiziri’s disease bringing him closer and closer to death, he races against Gunma in the F3000 Mie Circuit. Is it possible for Gunma to beat a man with nothing to lose who has surpassed his own limitations to reach an almost impossible speed?
2018-05-14|2018-05-20.name: Finger Post

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description: In order to become the battle shrine maiden to defeat the raging god Yusemi, the living god Koharu has been raised in Isshinden Temple. She was promised that she may leave the temple once she became a fully-fledged god. However, she runs away, wanting to see boys. She encounters Yajuro, a serious boy who practices kendo, and his cousin Haruchika. Along with Yatsutose, who came to search for Koharu, they fight Yusemi. Koharu finds out who her enemies are, as well as the secret of her birth. She eventually finds out who she really needs to destroy, the true enemies.
2018-05-14|2018-05-20.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description: Sawa challenges the All-Japan Championship! What kind of ping-pong will she play against Mai Kiyoura, "Idol of Ping-Pong?" And what will happen when "that" mystery guy appears?
2018-05-14|2018-05-20.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description: Nozomi has married Shinji, an office worker in Tokyo, and is enjoying her newly-wed lifestyle. Until suddenly, Shinji's older brother runs off with his new family, forcing Nozomi to move into Shinji's family's home in the sticks! This is a cheeful manga about the struggles of mother and daughter-in-laws.
2018-05-14|2018-05-20.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description:
“THE COALITION” spells doom!

For decades, the mysterious figure known as the Jonin trained and tutored the agents of MI-6’s Ninja Programme. In his hands, the men and women of Britain’s most elite secret service were refined into more than spies… They became human weapons capable of inflicting extraordinary damage and defying the laws of nature itself. Now, after decades thought dead, this master killer has resurfaced…and recruited a new circle of undying, seemingly ageless powerhouses from across the Valiant Universe for reasons unknown. The Jonin’s revenge will cast a long shadow – and, to meet it head on, Ninjak has assembled his own squadron of heavy-hitting heroes – including Livewire, Dr. Mirage, Punk Mambo, and GIN-GR – for the ultimate black-ops mission!

Renowned writer Christos Gage (Netflix’s Daredevil) and incendiary artist Juan José Ryp (BRITANNIA) unleash the next chapter in an international super-spy thriller colliding Valiant’s newest superteams together in an untold show of force!

FINAL ISSUE! The band has reached the end of their tour and Veronica's booked them for a big show! Have they learned enough to open up for JOSIE AND THE PUSSYCATS? The rockin' conclusion to the beloved rock 'n' roll comic is here!

The hit comic book series based on Dan Harmon and Justin Roiland's hilarious [adult swim]™ animated show RICK AND MORTY™ continues in all-new stories not seen on TV!

Catch up on the adventures of degenerate genius scientist Rick Sanchez as he drags his inherently timid grandson Morty Smith on dangerous adventures across the universe! This volume features Eisner-nominated writers Kyle Starks (Sexcastle) and Magdalene Visaggio (Kim & Kim) in collaboration with series artists CJ Cannon and Marc Ellerby, plus guest writers Tini Howard (Rick and Morty™: Pocket Like You Stole It), Pamela Ribon (Moana), and Rick and Morty™storyboard artist Erica Hayes.

Watch as Summer discovers doomed romance! Learn the tragic secrets of Krombopulos Michael! Check out some really cool dinosaurs! All that and more in this collection of Rick and Morty™ comics! Collects issues #31-35.
2018-05-14|2018-05-20.name: Volume Seven

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description:
What happens when you combine mummies, ninjas, and fighting dads? Find out in "Dadliest Warrior"! When Milo sneaks on board a ship, he discovers his dad isn't just a mummy, he's Master Mummy, expert in martial arts. But will the evil ninjas also aboard the ship be too tough to defeat on their escape back home?

Princes Kai, Bruno, Leonhard, and Licht have been making great strides thanks to an excellent education from Heine, the royal tutor. Even so, with the return of Prince Eins, the eldest of the brothers and heir apparent to the crown, the wall they must climb in the struggle to become the most qualified candidate for the throne looks more colossal than ever. Can the four younger princes stand up to their biggest rival?
2018-05-14|2018-05-20.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description: After Hanabi is heartbroken, she goes to Karuizawa with Ebato. This journey is guiding the two towards an end to their relationship. Elsewhere, even after Mugi conveyed all of his feelings to Akane, the free spirited girl didn't reply in kind. Who is the one that holds the keys to her heart?
2018-05-14|2018-05-20.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-14|2018-05-20.description:
La conclusion du deuxième cycle en apothéose !

Rome, an 12 avant J.C. L’empereur Auguste est tout puissant. Alix a plus de 50 ans. Il est sénateur.

Murés dans le tombeau d’Auguste, Alix et Kephren attendent la mort. Le fils d’Enak aura tout perdu dans sa quête de la Cybèle d’orichalque. Ignorant leur sort, l’empereur a ordonné à sa sœur, Lidia, de détruire la terrible idole cachée en Italie. Nul ne devra jamais plus pouvoir s’en emparer. Mais qui pourrait résister à la promesse d’acquérir la puissance et l’éternité ?
2018-05-14|2018-05-20.name: La Puissance et l'Éternité

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description:
When you sail with the same crew of people across a big body of water, you can’t get away from them. Now several of the relationships that have developed are coming to a fever pitch and with nowhere to go, things are about to get serious. And no relationship is more fraught than Raven and Ximena. At this point the two of them are bound to either kiss or fight. Which one will it be?

Note: The digital edition (4/18/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: Love and Revenge Chapter Seven: The Dreaded Pairing Off

volume.name: Princeless: Raven The Pirate Princess: Year Two

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description: Young Gregory grows unhappy and restless when his father moves the entire family into an old family home in a new neighborhood. While awake in his bed, a glimmer from the floor attracts Gregory's attention. He discovers a medallion on which there is a drawing of the great church that sits opposite his new residence. Bullied for being new, and ignored at home, Gregory decides to explore the church and the giant stone statue that rests atop of it. During his visit, the medallion begins to shine intensely and, with a flash, Gregory is hurled back to the 17th century, where gargoyles, sorcerers and magical beings live in harmony and magic.
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: Chapter 7: The Last Portal

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description: Yushi continues to spend his precious summer vacation slaving away at the shipping company. But one day, he saves a young girl, Yumi, from taking her own life, who ends up taking a liking to him. Caught between a rock and a hard place, Yushi decides to bring her with him to a club gathering for foreigners. And back at the apartment, chaos ensues when Antiquary unveils an astonishing new find! The world is as big as you want to make it!
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description: The girls seem to face new challenges everywhere they turn, and the pressure is threatening to tear them apart. Even their normal lives aren't free of stress -- particularly when Will's long absent father returns! Will the girls be able to pull it together before a new enemy emerges?
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: Part III. A Crisis on Both Worlds Volume 1

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description: A genius chef in the media comes to Tomikyu. Sota goes to meet him again to talk and visits his house. But he sees an unexpected scene! Worrying and struggling in the cooking world, it is the adolescence of the young chefs!!
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description: After suffering a massive setback, Amelia Earhart and D.B. Cooper push forward in their quest to reach the portal that will take them back to Earth.
The conclusions of High School Romance! This is Max's last stand against Elliot! Can he save Candy?
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: Chapter Seven

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description: It was only supposed to be an innocent hike... but when this group of friends took shelter in the mountains, their lives changed forever thanks to one book. Find all the twist and turns that ensue, as these teens slowly yet surely whittle down.

Are men condemned to be the Gods’ toys?

They are two brothers, born into a world fallen into ruins, where even Gods seem to be exhausted and about to fade away. These two brothers are entirely different from each other: one is strong and stupid, and ultimately powerless in front of adversity; the other, on the contrary, dreams only of forgotten knowledge, of voyages and reconquests. For the good of humanity, he will go as far as renouncing the pact he made with the Gods, by defying Zeus and his powerful wife, Hera.
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: The Clairvoyant

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description: Shelly and the Seven Sinners battle the Sentinel Juggernauts for Chris. They have his emblem, but is it too late? All the while, Chris is having an inner battle of his own with Apep. .
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: Abandon All Hope

2018-05-21|2018-05-27.description: The sullied air of the world can only be cleaned by the stix, a device powered by human limbs. Tonika, a rich nobleman fell from grace when his fathers plan to overtake the government was botched. Now poor and unable to afford the limbs needed to power his stix, Tonika faces the challenge of learning how to live on the other side of the class pyramid.

Êtes-vous prêts pour une guerre des nerfs sur fond de calculs, trahisons et révélations blessantes entre amis ?

Shiho Sawaragi se fait voler l’argent du voyage de classe dont elle était responsable. Le coupable est forcément l’un de ses camarades de classe ! Quelques jours plus tard, cinq élèves dont Shiho sont enlevés et forcés de participer au « jeu de l’amitié » afin de rembourser la dette de l’un d’entre eux. S’engage alors une guerre des nerfs sur fond de calculs, trahisons et révélations blessantes entre amis…
2018-05-21|2018-05-27.name: Tome 7

2018-05-28|2018-06-03.description:
Mera's carefully guided tour of the Empire has opened Akame's eyes to the suffering of its people. However, the Oarburghs' loose alleigance to whoever pays them is an even less-palatable philosophy than that of the Rebel Army. Up until now, Akame has resisted Mera's advances--professional and intimate--but with her captor's patience running thin and her sword out of reach, Akame will have to rely on a whole new set of skills if she wants to survive!

Chapter Titles

  • Chapter 38: Where There Is Justice
  • Chapter 39: Assassin Instruction
  • Chapter 40: Self-Sacrifice
  • Chapter 41: Melee Under Moonlight
  • Chapter 42: ?
2018-05-28|2018-06-03.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-28|2018-06-03.description:
CRAFTY SEA CREATURES!

Wakasa wants to write a book! Before he can do that, he’s got to master a few rudimentary skills–like learning how to write the word merman. After that, things get dirty when Takasu and Wakasa decide to make mudballs. Meanwhile, Tatsumi’s uncle is cooking up his own crafty creations: romantic bath salts! And who better to test them out but the merman in Tatsumi’s bathtub?
2018-05-28|2018-06-03.name: Crafty Sea Creatures!

2018-05-28|2018-06-03.description:
A group of "workers" whose better judgement has been clouded by hopes and expectations have descended into the unknown depths of a mysterious tomb.

These trespassers include the small but elite team Foresight, the storied warriors of Heavy Masher, the crew lead by a legendary elder worker, Green Leaf, and the invincible swordsmen of Angel.

They are some of the best that can be hired, but as more and more vengeful residents of Nazarrick appear, will any make it out alive?

Contents

  • Prologue
  • Chapter 1: An Invitation To Death
  • Chapter 2: Butterflies Caught In A Spider's Web
  • Chapter 3: The Great Tomb
  • Chapter 4: A Handful of Hope
  • Epilogue
2018-05-28|2018-06-03.name: The Invaders of the Great Tomb

2018-05-28|2018-06-03.description: Saki Asami works in the emergency room at the Suginami Hospital. Patients needing emergency attention come to her workplace, night and day.Here, Saki comes into contact with people from different backgrounds and it is here that we see her in full action as the enthuastic nurse wanting to help everyone.
2018-05-28|2018-06-03.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-28|2018-06-03.description: When you live surrounded by extra-terrestrials, it's hard to argue with the idea that aliens are real. But ghosts? Now that's something entirely different! Still, there's a lot of rumors about the school's oldest, abandoned building... and when Yuuki and company decide to investigate first-hand, they just might get more than they bargained for. Amidst all the romantic misadventure that surrounds their day-to-day lives, things are about to get just a little bit paranormal...
2018-05-28|2018-06-03.name: Vol. 7

2018-05-28|2018-06-03.description:
“CAT AND DOG INVESTIGATIONS”

Cat Curio and Pooch need Cassie and Vlad’s help with a case, and it’s fun to catch up with friends! The epic return a lot of you begged for. Enjoy it. This one’s a one-shot.

Higuchi, overjoyed to see Yotaro satisfy so many people, longs to create new rakugo stories with him, though it’s heresy in Yakumo’s eyes. 2018-06-04|2018-06-10.description:
The monstrous creatures of Shrae's Ark have been tasked with protecting Noah and his flock. But the shocking nature of the creature that plague's Noah may set the monsters of the Dark Ark at each other's throats!

From writer Cullen Bunn (X-Men Blue, Deadpool, Venom) and artist Juan Doe (AMERICAN MONSTER, WORLD READER) comes a sinister tale of biblical proportions that HAD to be told at AfterShock Comics.
2018-06-04|2018-06-10.name: Beneath the Surface

2018-06-04|2018-06-10.description: "Drunken Master." Good news, bad news time. The good news is magic works in Lark's new world, and even Brenar's mortal wounds can be healed, if you get the victim to the right sorcerer soon enough. The bad news is the only sorcerer they trust in these paranoid times is a drunk. Can Ulmore the Great and Terrible sober up soon enough to save Brenar's life? Plus, a new backup feature: "My Monstrous Life" by Mr. Willingham and art by Shawn McManus!

When a telekinetic inmate destroys the old wing of The Pit, Freust is left trapped in the labyrinthine hallways of the asylum with her most dangerous patients. To avoid a violent death, she attempts to treat them on the fly using only her wits, but she is out of her depth and outnumbered. With Inmate Eleven orchestrating the chaos, a new horror awaits Freust around every corner, including an old foe with a teeth-shattering score to settle.

A long and neverending journey awaits the little boy, yet with such a strong will Kato's got, he turns every trouble into a milestone, every enemy into an encounter unforgettable.

La Carnicería

Hex Spencer's first night Gatecrashing gets off to a very rocky start when she is paired with the most notorious medic in District 11. Across town, Kippie Moeketsi dispatches a crew to find out who is behind the counterfeit eyeballs when he and Dr. Dorazio are visited by Palomar Police detectives.
2018-06-04|2018-06-10.name: La Carnicería

2018-06-11|2018-06-17.description:
Getting out of bed on time is a challenge for anyone. But getting Yoshiko out of bed on the first day of the new school year isn’t just a challenge for Akkun—it’s his Everest, his northwest passage, his white whale. Or at least, that’s what Yoshiko’s decided it’s going to be. She’s determined to kick the school year off in style, and if that means provoking her old friend beyond the point of sanity, well—nobody can accuse her of being insufficiently committed to her ideals. Her stupid, stupid ideals.

Note: The digital edition (6/12/2018) for this volume was released before the print edition.

2018-06-11|2018-06-17.description:
Pain and pleasure collide when a sophisticated underworld boss crosses paths with a naive photographer hell-bent on bringing him down!

This deluxe edition includes never-before-released material as well as a double-sided color insert and special cover treatment! Photographer Akihito Takaba takes on a risky assignment trying to document the illegal activities of the Japanese underworld. When he captures its leader—the handsome, enigmatic Ryuichi Asami—in the crosshairs of his viewfinder, Takaba’s world is changed forever.

Akihito is freeloading at Asami’s apartment, polishing up not only his photography skills but also his skills as a househusband. His career is on the upswing, even though he still finds himself in perilous situations and has the occasional run-in with police. So imagine Akihito’s surprise when, while out chasing a scoop, he spots Asami with another man clinging to him…in tears! Are Akihito’s days as Asami’s live-in numbered?

Everything has gone wrong for Morea Doloniac: her friend and mentor, Knight Terkio, has disappeared, and is presumed dead. Immaros, leader of the Angels, has escaped, taking with him a virus made using Morea’s blood cells. And, as for Torrès, he leads a dissident faction, The Hydras, within the Council of Dragons.

But life goes on. That is precisely the problem when you are immortal, because things are going to get more complicated in time... With the Dragons under the threat of a bacteriological weapon, which could exterminate their whole species, Morea is deprived of her allies and support. “KLANG, KLANG…KLUNK?” In the ultimate display of power, Livewire has plunged the United States into darkness. Five years from now, in Limbo-town (formerly New York City), Domino, Machine Man, Gorilla Man, Ren Kimura and Deadpool are running from a group of Inhumans, who consists of Triton, Sheath, Inferno, Karnak and Lockjaw. It's not long before they are cornered and forced to fight they way out.

The fight draws the attention of some demons, and the two teams are forced to join forces and fight the demons. During the fight Domino and her team escape into the sewer, there they come across a beaten and bloody Masacre.

He gives them a flash drive and dies. Machine Man deduces that that the flash drive has the location of Negasonic Teenage Warhead, but unknown to him he had been hacked by the Inhumans and they are listening to everything the team is doing.

Then Present Day, Shcaefer Theatre, the newly formed Mercs for Money are deciding if they should help the Mutants or the Inhuman in the battle for the Terrigen Mists. They come to the decision to help the Mutants, knowing many will die no matter which side wins. This causes Negasonic to think and while alone in her room she uses her powers, to unknown effect.

Five Years Later, in the jungle somewhere, Domino's team has found Negasonic's secret hideout, where she is being protected by Polaris, Rachel Grey, Nightcrawler, Xorn, and Goldball. Deadpool then takes Negasonic away to talk and ask her a favor, to bring back the Terrigan Mists.

NEW STORY ARC.

Zhia Malen has delivered the first blow to Earth, but back on her home planet of Valius, one man carries out a secret mission on her behalf.

The city is brought down by a tide of child abductions. Kids disappear in groups. Danila and Sneak are pretty sure that there are demonic forces involved. Soon they discover that all the abducted teenagers are delivered to the abandoned factory to take part in Cowboys and Indians game. Kids, the Cowboys, are supposed to run from the Indians (evil spirits) until one final participant is left. The winner will be granted a wish. Sold relic, part 6

Travelling through time, young man Andrey Radov has to collect magical gems and retrieve his family's cross to return to his era and stop the evil Magister of a secret order!

It's 1877 and the third siege of Plevna during the Russo-Turkish war. In Russian camp Andrey meets the "White General" Skobelev and his aide - Igor, Andrey's brother! Having resigned himself to his fate, the newly-born friar begins to prepare for the upcoming battle... And there is something to prepare for: Turkish general Osman Pasha intends to win the battle, calling upon the underworld forces and resorting to the help of the Magister! But Andrey manages to break their insidious plan and successfully retrieves the first Power Gem - the Ruby of Shakhriman!

Meanwhile, enraged by the failure, the Magister is trying to deal with Andrey another way: he sneaks into the hospital and turns off the poor guy's life-support machine. However, the doctors did the impossible and brought Andrey back to life! After that, he got transferred in the midst of The Patriotic War of 1812 not too far from the village of Saltanovka where Russian general Nikolay Raevsky is getting ready to give fight to the French marshal Louis-Nicolas Davout. Unfortunately, not only the insidious Magister is on the enemy's side, but also a mysterious freemason with a ring inlayed with the Power Gem...

The House of Bones, part 2

Lilia Romanova is the ordinary Moscow girl getting ready for college. Well, the "ordinary" would not be the right word for it, because Lilia is a geek, a passionate books, comics, movies, video games and other pop culture phenomena aficionado. But her life changes dramatically when she encounters a mysterious girl in red, driving a bike on her campus. The girl leaves behind an odd case that Lilia picks up. The case happens to contain the ink that spills out, gets on Lilia's skin, and immediately after that she becomes the prey for the fairy tale characters, so different in the real world from their familiar selves.

Luckily, the girl gets saved by a couple of wizards, Sasha and Arthur, the members of the ancient Bookwizard Order whose job is to guard the thin line between the works of fiction and reality. Fortunately, Arthur manages to seal the characters on the loose into the book, escaping the death by a hairbreadth. The mysterious library keeper and the elder of the wizards' order, Angelina Evgenievna summons Lilia the next morning to figure out the magic ink situation.

The next morning Sasha picks Lilia up from her place and escorts her to the Library. Nightingale, having come around, greets her there and announces the Initiation process. And now Lilia is about to go through the mysterious House of Bones...

2017-04-10|2017-04-16.description:
Scarab vs. Bull/Godfall

Issue #07 is 28 pages (but for the same price as issues #05 & #06), is comprised of an 18 page main story by Geoff Thorne (writer for Marvel's "Mosaic," Dark Horse Present's "Journeymen," indie project "Prodigal," TNT TV's "The Librarians" and "Leverage" scripts, etc.) and Todd Harris (storyboard artist on films such as "Thor 3," "John Wick: Chapter 2" and "Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles 2")-the duo known collectively as Genre Nineteen, and my 8-page back-up story.

Genre Nineteen dips into L.A. lore & Egyptian myth by presenting The White Bull. Though new pantheon rules forbid the immortals to "walk the face of the Earth," Nebthet-Set's estranged wife-realizes that a Battle Royale between Menthu & Set is waiting in the wings. To assist the young sun god, the powerful goddess (via Neith, her chief lieutenant) dispatches immortal (but not "godly") help.

But Menthu's opinion is that he can most assuredly do without "assistance" of this sort.

The short story introduces a nameless, extremely malevolent djinn-one that has a millennia-old grudge to settle. Even though this grudge centers around "original" Menthu, this is immaterial to the djinn. (Additionally, much of the brief narrative's concentration is on the Egyptian and Akkadian pantheons from the distant past.) Despite the creature's overwhelming cowardice, it now has a chance to avenge itself. It will use time-and multiple "vessels"-doing exactly this.
2017-04-10|2017-04-16.name: Scarab vs. Bull/Godfall

2017-04-10|2017-04-16.description: Richard and Astarte are detoured off the road and into a castle, but the lady of the castle is not what she seems.

It is always a scary concept when you open yourself to someone. Will they hurt you like people in your past have? Don't forget that love NEEDS to exist in this world. Nothing can really have meaning without it and is that a world you want to survive in?

Magika Swordsman and Summoner is an ongoing fantasy manga series about a young magical summoner and his trials and tribulations in summoner school. Based upon a popular light novel series in Japan, Magika Swordsman and Summoner is a growing franchise that is sure to appeal to fans of magic school sagas like Dragonar Academy and Zero's Familiar. Magika Swordsman and Summoner is an ongoing series that contains coloured inserts in each volume. Parallel to our dimension is a world filled with magic, home to a host of mystical beings and fantastical powers. Humanity has learned to harness these forces and bring forth that world's entities to do their bidding through the power of 'summoners.' Our world has never been the same. Fifteen years later, Kazuki Hayashizaki is chosen as the first male summoner. His attendance at an all female summoner school, however, is met with opposition - and none so strongly than from his own sister who is the school's most skilled swordsman. Kazuki's sister has conflicting feelings a bout her little brother and can't stand for him to take up his new role. Kazuki struggles against the machinations of his sister and the other students. Can he overcome adversity and learn to become a first rate summoner?

Now, for the first time, all of Marv Wolfman and George Pérez’s NEW TEEN TITANS tales are available in a comprehensive series of trade paperback editions, featuring the legendary story arc “The Judas Contract”!

The original Teen Titans always stood in the shadows of their larger-than-life mentors—young heroes like Robin, Wonder Girl and Kid Flash saw plenty of action, but it was Batman, Wonder Woman and the Flash who ultimately called the shots.

All that changed, however, with the arrival of THE NEW TEEN TITANS in 1980—and the lives of DC’s adolescent adventurers would never be the same!

Crafted by comics legends Marv Wolfman and George Pérez, this all-new super-title featured greater dangers, fiercer emotions and more tangled relationships than any that had come before. The Titans’ celebrated stories have ensured that the names of Starfire, Cyborg, Raven and Changeling will be passed down through history alongside those famous aliases employed by Dick Grayson, Donna Troy and Wally West.

THE NEW TEEN TITANS VOLUME SEVEN collects issues #42-48 of the classic title as well as the ANNUAL #3, and features the “The Judas Contract”!

Will Luke Cage join the battle, or choose to stay with his wife and child? As the situation goes from bad to worse, Iron Fist must seek the secrets of the Phoenix! Three of Earth's Mightiest will be taken captive, but no jail can hold them for long - or can it? And when all looks dark, can the Illuminati succeed where the Avengers failed? Anyone who gets out alive will face an era-ending mystical force too big for even Doctor Strange to handle! Collecting NEW AVENGERS (2010) #16.1 and #17-34.

Don Lomax's critically acclaimed Vietnam Journal series returns with all new stories. THIS ISSUE: "CHILDREN OF THE DUST" - Murphy's Law: Anything that can go wrong, will go wrong. 'Journal' and his fledgling photographer, Lindsey, follow the 11th Armored Cavalry into Cambodia on the heals of President Nixon’s 1970 incursion into South Vietnam’s fragile neighbor, itself on the verge of civil war. Suddenly they are lost and unprotected. The brutality and horror they are forced to witness sets even Neithammer, a seasoned war correspondent, on his heals as the blood sodden countryside fights back against the insult of war and mayhem. They discover of a wiry, headstrong Nun named Emily in the aftermath of a battle. She in searching the burned-out hulks of a destroyed South Vietnamese armored column. They find her blessing the dead and then robbing them of any scraps of food available in order to feed the starving children of the orphanage she and her fellow Nuns maintain in the middle of the war. 'Journal' and Lindsey join her, in the beginning, simply because she has a truck and 'Journal' is tired of walking. But soon they are involved in the very survival of the war’s most vulnerable, and fragile victims.

Nathan Hale tackles a topic fans have been asking about for years: World War II. On December 7, 1941, the Japanese bombed Pearl Harbor, officially bringing the United States into World War II. A new generation of pilots were recruited to fly bombing missions for the United States, and from that group, volunteers were requested for a dangerous secret assignment. For the first time in American history, Army bombers would be launched from an aircraft carrier. Once at sea, they were told their mission was a retaliation strike against targets in Tokyo. But on the day of the raid, a Japanese patrol boat spotted them and they had to launch early, with barely enough fuel to get them past their target. After the bombing, some pilots crashed, some were captured, and many ended up in mainland China and were carried to safety by Chinese villagers, being hunted by Japanese forces all the while. With tales of high-flying action and bravery, Raid of No Return is a story of heartbreak and survival during wartime.

In "Beer Run," illustrated by Andrew Cieslinski, the beer runs out in hell and Krampus decides it's time to finally check out a bar called Holidaze up on the surface he's heard so much about. Poor Krampus has no idea what he's getting himself into.

Told in the style of a children's storybook, "Twas the Night Before Krampus" by Dave Dellecese and Andrew Cieslinski tells the tale of a family that wakes in the middle of the night to the sounds of hooves making their way toward them. Krampus has arrived!

In "Tall Tales," illustrated by Edward Yancey, the Holidaze gang tries to one-up each other with what each believes is the "true story of Krampus."

And a back cover tribute by Patrick McCuen to Harper's Weekly and Thomas Nast's iconic 19th Century Santa Claus illustration but featuring Krampus!
